dialogue: You've seen this a million times - you can do it.
Why don't you do it?
No way. Tried years ago - almost got killed.
Well, I don't want to almost get killed either. I'm a civilian.
We got your back. We'll move in if it starts getting pear-shaped.
Honestly, these are pretty good, man.
They breathe really well.
Yeah. Hah!
You're Billy. You're a killer! You kill for a living!
Grab your shit. Sit down.
Listen, this whole thing has got to be based on trust.
You got him, man! Great job, Gary. That was so smooth... who WAS that guy in there?
I don't know.
Hey, can I have my pants back now?
Yeah.
Oh no, I made that part up. I have been out there a few times, birding.
Birding?
Pill-e-ated?

Yeah. Just these big, beautiful kinda pterodactyl-looking guys - technically, it's the first cousin to the illusive Ivory Bill, which there was rumored sighting of back in 2005 - first in over a hundred years. Caused a big stir, because most people think they're extinct, but others think that they might have just developed a successful strategy to avoid people.
...let me be your therapist?!
She's not a killer - she just needs to get it together. I'm trying to serve the overall public good.
Okay, talk soon, Gary.
Bye.
Your ears working?
Yep.
Great - remember, audio only - gotta get a good recording.
Got it.
..there's a bunch of shit coming down that we gotta figure out quick or we are both fucked.
